metadata.Description: Open source energy modeling tools are software tools that allow users to simulate and analyze energy systems, including energy generation, consumption, and distribution, using open source code and data.

entities.Description: Open source energy modeling tools are software tools that allow users to simulate and analyze energy systems, including energy generation, consumption, and distribution, using open source code and data.
Markets where electricity, natural gas, and other energy commodities are bought and sold.
Agencies that promote and support the development and use of renewable energy sources.
The use of less energy to provide the same level of output or service, resulting in reduced energy consumption, cost savings, and environmental benefits.
Cooperatives that enable individuals or communities to collectively own and manage energy resources.
The process of capturing and storing energy for later use.

energy efficiency
relations.Description: Energy efficiency measures address energy waste by promoting the use of energy-efficient technologies and practices.

relations.Subject: energy efficiency
relations.Description: Energy efficiency employs energy audits to identify energy-saving opportunities and optimize energy use.

relations.Subject: renewable energy agencies
relations.Description: Renewable energy agencies employ experts in the field of renewable energy to drive innovation and promote the adoption of clean energy technologies.

relations.Subject: renewable energy agencies
relations.Description: Renewable energy agencies collaborate with research institutions to advance scientific knowledge and develop new technologies for renewable energy generation.

relations.Subject: energy cooperatives
relations.Description: Energy cooperatives address energy poverty by providing affordable and sustainable energy solutions to underserved communities.

relations.Subject: energy cooperatives
relations.Description: Energy cooperatives collaborate with local governments to implement renewable energy projects and promote sustainable energy practices.

relations.Subject: energy storage
relations.Description: Energy storage addresses the issue of intermittency in renewable energy sources by storing excess energy for use during periods of low generation.

relations.Subject: energy markets
relations.Description: Energy markets address the issue of energy access by ensuring the availability and affordability of energy sources for all segments of society.

relations.Subject: renewable energy certificates
relations.Description: Renewable energy certificates are implemented by the Energy Efficiency Policy to promote the use of renewable energy sources.

relations.Subject: energy efficiency
relations.Description: Energy efficiency measures address energy waste by promoting the use of energy-efficient technologies and practices.

OSeMOSYS is an open-source energy system optimization model that helps in analyzing and planning energy systems. It allows for the assessment of different energy scenarios and the evaluation of policy options.
relations.Subject: osemosys

relations.Description: MESSAGEix is an open-source integrated assessment model that combines energy, economy, and climate systems. It enables the analysis of energy and climate policies, as well as the assessment of technology pathways and their impacts.
relations.Subject: messageix

relations.Description: LEAP (Long-range Energy Alternatives Planning System) is an integrated software tool for energy policy analysis and climate change mitigation assessment. It helps in evaluating energy systems, analyzing energy demand and supply, and assessing the impacts of different policy measures.
relations.Subject: leap

relations.Description: TIMES (The Integrated MARKAL-EFOM System) is a technology-rich, bottom-up energy system optimization model. It allows for the analysis of energy systems, the assessment of technology options, and the evaluation of energy and climate policies.
relations.Subject: times

relations.Description: PLEXOS is a software platform for energy market modeling and analysis. It enables the simulation and optimization of power systems, including the integration of renewable energy sources, demand response, and energy storage.
relations.Subject: plexos
